title: Alignment and architecture freeze
decisions: Role model fixed: platform_admin, tenant_admin, tenant_user
Platform and tenant route boundaries fixed under /api/v1
Tenant ownership enforced via tenant_id + auth dependency guards
Platform API-key ownership fixed as platform-admin-only for MVP
Audit and denial-event telemetry required for admin and authz actions
rollback_strategy: Revert deployment image and restore DB snapshot
Keep additive migration path and guarded compatibility adapters
Preserve audit/security logs as immutable records
